critique: The document is a short executive order regarding the reinstatement of Miss Irene C. Claveloux to a position in the General Accounting Office. The tone is formal and bureaucratic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is likely a sense of order and fairness, though the document is unlikely to evoke strong emotions. It is difficult to assess the intensity of specific emotions based on this document alone, so I will assign low scores across the board initially.
